Description: Smoking pipe made of clay, pottery, wood, hide (with hair), string.
Curator's comments: Egyptian Dept. Register,v.2: "Modern African. Transferred to British Antiquities". Probably from the Sobat River area.
Acquisition notes: 1875,0810.1 to 327 is a collection mainly of antiquities from Egypt formed by Anthony Charles Harris, purchased from Selima Harris. Of these nos.249 to 253 were later regarded as modern, and were transferred to the ethnographical collection.
